name: Slingshooter
description:
The first of (hopefully) many 30-day-games. This was developed entirely in the month of January as part of a New-Year's resolution to make a full game every month.

Use the mouse to launch your ship and fly it around the galaxy. Careful though, you have limited fuel and a very fragile ship! 

[Escape] resets the level

Features:

  • 10 levels
  • An end-game scoring & grading system
  • Original art, music, and sound
  • Some cool physics fun!

I hope you enjoy!
